data.title: The Right Place
data.meta_description: The Right Place serves both current and prospective companies in Greater Grand Rapids, providing one-stop assistance for location, innovation and growth.
data.text:
As the Marketing and Communications Manager, Allyssa manages the website, social media channels, blog, email and digital marketing campaigns for The Right Place and the MMTC-West team. She also leads the videography efforts for The Right Place's social media accounts.

Past Experience

Before Allyssa joined The Right Place in late 2021, she was the Communications Specialist for Grand Rapids-based nonprofit D.A. Blodgett – St. John’s. Previous to that she was the Marketing Assistant for Whaley Children’s Center located in Flint, MI.

Education

• Bachelor of Art in Advertising & Public Relations | Grand Valley State University

• Associate of Applied Science in Media Arts & Entertainment Technology | Mott Community College

Community Involvement

• West Michigan Public Relations Society of America Board Member, PRoof Committee Vice-Chair
